person.persName: Ransom Shavers (Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and solider. Virginia native. Son of Susan Shavers. Married to Delia Picklesimer Shavers in Johnson County, Kentucky, on March 6, 1855. Farmer in Johnson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Johnson County in 1860. Farmer in Johnson County in 1863. Farmer in Johnson County in 1864. Served in the 45th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as a private from March 14, 1864, to February 14, 1865.
